# DbComponent.Begin method

Begins a new database transaction.

```csharp
public Task Begin(DbType dbType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| dbType | Type of database |

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | Thrown when a transaction is already active |
| NotSupportedException | Thrown when database type is not supported |
